casebody.data:
Lisa HUNT, as Guardian Ad Litem of Hailey Rosina Hunt, a Minor, and Lisa and Russell Hunt, as Parents and Natural Guardians of Hailey Rosina Hunt, and Lisa and Russell Hunt, Individually, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
VIRTUA HEALTH, INC., Virtua West Jersey Hospital Voorhees, Linda Faragasso, R.N.C., Christine Pease, R.N., and Barbara Jones, R.N., Defendants-Respondents,
and
Women's Group for Ob/Gyn, Pamela Kopelove, M.D., Jean Torrance, R.N.C., Noreen Palmay, R.N., and Dr. Lynch, Defendants. C-358 September Term 2017
079863 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 1, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004196-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
